targets.expr:
sum by (service) (go_memstats_mspan_inuse_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) +
sum by (service) (go_memstats_mspan_sys_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) +
sum by (service) (go_memstats_mcache_inuse_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) +
sum by (service) (go_memstats_mcache_sys_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) +
sum by (service) (go_memstats_buck_hash_sys_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) +
sum by (service) (go_memstats_gc_sys_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) +
sum by (service) (go_memstats_other_sys_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) +
sum by (service) (go_memstats_next_gc_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"})

sum by (service) (go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) +
sum by (service) (go_memstats_heap_sys_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) +
sum by (service) (go_memstats_heap_idle_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) +
sum by (service) (go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) +
sum by (service) (go_memstats_heap_released_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"})

sum by (service) (go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) +
sum by (service) (go_memstats_stack_sys_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"})

sum by (service) (go_memstats_mallocs_total{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) -
sum by (service) (go_memstats_frees_total{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"})
sum by (pod) (go_memstats_mallocs_total{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}) - sum by (pod) (go_memstats_frees_total{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service"})
